actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to protect the health and welfare of children involved in research.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Children's Research Protection Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) review the regulations concerning the protection of children participating as subjects in research and report to the Congress; (2) require, within six months of enactment, all research involving children that is conducted, supported, or regulated by the Department of Health and Human Services to be in compliance with such regulations; (3) award grants to qualified academic research institutions and research networks with the appropriate expertise to provide training in pediatric clinical pharmacology; and (4) establish a program to enter into contracts with qualified individuals who hold an M.D. under which such individuals agree to undergo training in, and practice, pediatric pharmacology. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to protect the health and welfare of children involved in research.
